channel.title: Microsoft Movies & TV on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Movies & TV on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Microsoft Abruptly Ceases Digital Movie and TV Sales
item.description: Microsoft, after nearly two decades, has exited the business of selling digital TV and movies. Without advance warning, Microsoft’s Movies & TV app as of Friday has stopped sales and rentals
